name: It Rains Flour
description:
Catch the ingredients that fall from the sky, to bake tasty pastry!

This game was made as an entry for the Mini-Jam-94 Game Jam.

Creators: gwydi (code) & phy(art).

Source Code: https://dev.rievo.net/msc/baking-game/ (don't expect to much, its a jam game)

Play the game in your browser: https://msc.rievo.page/baking-game/

btw. this is the first game we released, suggestions are very welcome : )
